version_description:
Following your great feedback we have updated our app.

Improvements include: 
- improved response time 
- better loading bar at the top of the screen to indicate when data is being loaded over the network
- miscellaneous bug fixes

Any feedback? 
Please let us know! We’re always working on making our apps just that little bit more user friendly. Please send feedback, suggestions or any great ideas to apps@hotelscombined.com

Following your great feedback we have updated our app.
- Improved app startup time.
- Fixed a bug preventing "phone to book" from working.
Bug fix for iOS5
Bug fixes

Now you can register with your email address or Facebook, and access your search preferences across both the app and website.

Any feedback?
Please let us know! We’re always working on making our apps just that little bit more user friendly. Please send feedback, suggestions or any great ideas to apps@hotelscombined.com.

• Price alerts feature. Set an alert and we’ll notify you when the price of the selected hotel drops by 10% or more.
• Fresh new home design. Search for hotels faster.
• Scrollable calendar design.
• Extended hotel features list. Search for hotels with a spa, free Wi-Fi, or  an Airport Shuttle, etc. 
• Check out verified guest reviews on the hotel page.
• Improved map search tool. Find hotels close to where you want to be.
• Support for iOS 10

• Price Alerts. Simply register or sign in, set an alert and we’ll notify you when the price of your selected hotel drops by 10% or more!
• New home screen and calendar design. Search for hotels more easily.
• Extended hotel features list. Search for hotels with a spa, free Wi-Fi, an Airport Shuttle and more.
• Real hotel reviews. Check out what people who actually stayed at the hotel think.
• Improved map search tool. Find hotels close to where you want to be.

We always welcome your feedback and are always looking to improve, so if you have any thoughts or suggestions, please let us know at apps@hotelscombined.com

Thank you for using our app!

• Secret Deals. Cheaper rates on selected hotels exclusively for our users.
• Improved map search tool. Find hotels in your ideal location.
• New search results page header. Clearer filtering and sorting options.
• Popular Features list. Top hotel features at a glance.
 
We always welcome your feedback and are always looking to improve, so if you have any thoughts or suggestions, please let us know at apps@hotelscombined.com
 
Thank you for using our app!

In this release, we have further improved our map tool, making it even easier to find your perfect hotel wherever you are.
We have also fixed a bug that was causing the app crash at start-up for certain users.
We always welcome your feedback and are always looking to improve, so if you have any thoughts or suggestions, please let us know at apps@hotelscombined.com
Thank you for using our app!
In this latest version, we've included some bugs fixes and performance improvements to make sure you get the best app experience

We are travelers - and that doesn't change because we're home. While we all do our part to keep our communities and families safe, we also want to help you explore now, so you can travel later.

We've given our app a fresh new look with easier navigation and a bit of inspiration.

We've added a COVID Travel Guide and FAQ section to provide everything you need to know to travel smart and stay safe during the COVID outbreak.

We are travelers - and that doesn't change because we're home. While we all do our part to keep our communities and families safe, we also want to help you explore now, so you can travel later.

We've given our app a fresh new look with easier navigation and a bit of inspiration.

We've added a COVID Travel Guide and FAQ section to provide everything you need to know to travel smart and stay safe during the COVID outbreak.
We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.

You can now plan your whole trip with HotelsCombined. Besides offering great accommodation deals, now you can start comparing and booking flights and car deals. HotelsCombined searches hundreds of other travel sites so you don't have to. Book a great hotel, flight, or rental car and save money with mobile-only rates and Secret Deals.
There is also information about safety measures that airlines are taking so you can feel safe while travelling. You can review them before booking. 
Of course we also made some under the hood improvements and fixed some bugs to give you the best app experience possible.
We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.

Have you upgraded to iOS 14 yet? If not, you will be missing out on the following new features:
- Support for approximate location.
- Upgrade account to Sign-in with Apple.
- A new Price Alerts widget.

And one more thing:

Are you a student and traveling on a budget? Rejoice because you can now find student-only flight fares in our app and save!
(Believe it or not, we had an actual student implement this feature.)
We added a new filter for searching cars that are deep-cleaned between rentals. These cars are also highlighted in the results list for your convenience.
We added a new filter for searching cars that are deep-cleaned between rentals. These cars are also highlighted in the results list for your convenience.
We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.
You can now switch between different currencies without leaving the search results screen.
Enjoy the fresh look in the Profile section.
We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.
We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.

Hello 2021! We are welcoming the new year with a new version of the app.
- You can now search rental cars based on the type of the car, directly from the app's home screen. Only interested in Minivan rentals? No problem, we got you covered!
The hotel property type filter received a visual overhaul. You can find the most common property types such as hotels and rentals directly on the Filters screen.

Saving flights, cars or stays while planning your trip just got easier. You can now conveniently manage all saved results for your trip directly from the search screen.

Apart from that, we have of course also squished some bugs to make your app experience even better (no actual bugs were harmed in the process).

Need a place to stay, and fast? From hotels to guest houses, we now show different categories of accommodation (complete with price estimates) on the Stays tab in Search to help you narrow down where you’re spending the night quicker.
We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.

Not seeing the results you want on a search? We made it faster and easier to manage your active search filters so you can see the kind of results you want quicker.
It's finally spooky season and for us there's nothing scarier than finding bugs in our code. That's why we removed any bug that we could find to make our app even better.

When opening the app, you expect to see content that matters to you right away. We feel you, which is why we have refreshed the look of our front page a bit to improve navigation and visibility.
Of course, that’s not the only thing we’ve been working on. We also tracked down a couple of bugs in our code and got rid of them.
Ever wanted to find a room with a Double Queen bed? Or perhaps a Deluxe Studio? We have now improved the way our Stays deals are displayed by grouping them based on the room type. Check it out!
